The Rules of the game

 Throw Button:
when the throw button is pressed 5 dice will be rolled for both the computer and the player.
Pressing the throw button again will enable a re-roll a re-roll allows the player to roll all the dice again! but this may also roll the 5 dice of the computer. The player is allowed only 2 re-rolls where pressing the throw button for a 3rd time will automatically update the score.
 Score Button:
Pressing the score button will end that round and update the score. This button can be pressed only when you first throw your dice
 Objective:
Reach a Score higher than 101 before the computer does, in the case where both the computer and the player reach a Score higher than 101 the higher Score will be taken.
